name: Ammo Drop (CrubeYawne)
description:
Simple game where you control dropping blocks to match 3 for ammo to use against an zombie invaders

3 or more Ammo boxes to convert to 3 shots against current enemy

3 or more Jam boxes to clear from grid

3 or more Heal boxes to heal player

Controls

Mouse/Keyboard Only

W/Up=Slow Down

S/Down= Speed Up

A/Left=Left

D/Right=Right

Made in Unreal Engine 5
